ok.description: Indicates whether the request was accepted or the last chunk processed successfully.

jobId.description: Deterministic identifier for the fallback job (uuid-v4).

status.description: Current lifecycle state for the fallback attempt.

queuedAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp of when the fallback job entered the queue.

completedAt.description: RFC 3339 timestamp captured once the fallback finishes.

errorMessage.description: Human-readable failure summary returned when status=failed.

estimatedLatencyMs.description: Estimated processing latency communicated during queue acknowledgement.
